duties_responsibilities.duty: Communicate project objectives, challenges, and scope with internal and external stakeholders.
Manage multiple projects, working closely with stakeholders to ensure deadlines are met and quality is delivered.
Research and specify products, equipment, and systems to meet client expectations.
Conduct calculations of heating/cooling load, ventilation quantities, and equipment selection for building mechanical systems.
Assess existing systems and provide recommendations for refurbishment or replacement.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering, PE license in IL required, WI preferred, prior healthcare experience preferred.
